document.full_text: pakistan's al qaeda-linked taliban said it could not confirm its fighters killed a saudi diplomat in the pakistani city of karachi on monday but expressed "full support" for the attack.
document.title: pakistani taliban say support killing of saudi diplomat
lines_and_colors: pakistan's al qaeda-linked taliban said it could not confirm its fighters killed a saudi diplomat in the pakistani city of karachi on monday but expressed "full support" for the attack.
